faq.title: Does Rainbow Crow have the capacity for my software project?
faq.description: Please contact us so we can understand the scale of your software project. We have very talented software engineers and are generally able to accomodate at any scale.

faq.title: Does rainbow crow have a WBENC certification?
faq.description: Yes, Rainbow Crow was founded and is run by two women with innovative ideas and big aspriations. In 2014 we received national certification as a Women's Business Enterprise (WBE) from the Women's Business Enterprise National Council (WBENC).
